Translations.Text: geudeul-eun mueos-e gwanhayeo seolo-ege mudneun geos-inga
geudeul-eun geue gwanhae uigyeon-eul dallihago issnola
geuleohji anhnola. geudeul-eun god alge doel geos-ila
dasi hanbeon, geuleohji anhnola. geudeul-eun god alge doel geos-ila
geuligo geudaedeul wie ilgob gaeui ganghan geos(haneul)eul jieoss-eumyeo
geuligo bisbang-ul-eul jjanaeneun guleum-eseo peobusneun bileul naelyeoss-euni
geunal napal-i bullimyeon geudaedeul-eun ttejieo ol geos-imyeo
geugos-eseo geudeul-eun yeong-guui sigan-eul meomul geos-imyeo
geudeul-eun geugos-eseo siwonhamdo, eumlyodo masboji moshal geos-ini
geuleoni neohuineun masbola, naega neohuiege jeung-gasikil geos-eun ojig beol ppun-ila
sillo (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehaneun jadeul-egeneun seong-gong-ui jangsoga jueojil geos-ini
geudeul-eun geugos-eseo sil-eobsneun maldo, geojismaldo deudji anh-eul geos-ila
geudae junim-eulobuteoui bosang-euloseo bepulm-ija gyesan-ui gyeolgwaloseo
haneulgwa daeji geuligo geu saie jonjaehaneun geos-ui junim, gajang jabilousin bun-egeseo on geos-ila. geudeul-eun geubunkke gwanhayeo eotteohan bal-eongwondo gaj-ji moshal geos-ila

yeonghon(gabeuliel cheonsa)gwa cheonsadeul-i daeyeol-eul jieo seoneun geunal geudeul-eun mal-eul haji moshal geos-ina, gajang jabilousin bunkkeseo heolaghasin janeun ye-oelo geuneun jinsil-eul malhal geos-ila
igeos-iyamallo jinliui nal-ila. geuleoni wonhaneun janeun geuui junimkkelo gwichagjileul dula

sillo naneun geudaedeul-ege gakkaun beol-eul gyeong-gohayeossnola. geunal ingan-eun jasin-ui du son-i naenoh-eun geos-eul bol geos-imyeo bulsinjaneun “naega heulg-ieossdamyeon joh-ass-eul geos-eul!” ilago malhage doel geos-ila
geudeul-i malhani “jinsillo uliga ijeon sangtaelo doedol-agandan mal-inga?”
geudeul-i malhagil “geugeos-eun geuleohdamyeon sonhaega doel gwihwan-ila”
sillo geugeos-eun hanbeon-ui goham soliil ppun-ila
bola, ije geudeul-eun wongi gadeughan daeji wie issnola
geuui junimkkeseo seongseuleoun goljjagiin ‘ttuwa’ eseo geuleul bulleossnola
“geudaeneun palao-egelo gala, sillo geuneun gyeong-gyeleul neom-eoseossnola”
“ ‘naega geudaeleul geudae junim-eulo indohalyeo hani, geuleohge geudaeneun (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehage doel geos-ila’ “
geu hu geu(mose)neun geu(palao)ege eomahan jingpyoleul boyeojueoss-euna
geu hu geuneun kkongmunileul ppaemyeo (geoyeogham-e) maejinhani
geu hu geuga malhagil “jim-eun geudaedeul-ui gajang jigohan junim-ila”
geulihayeo hananimkkeseoneun naesewa hyeonse-ui jing-gyeloseo geuleul umkyeojab-eusyeossnola
jinsillo igeos-eneun dulyeowohaneun jaleul wihan gyohun-i issnola
changjoga deo eolyeoun geos-eun geudaedeul-inga animyeon haneul-inga? geubunkkeseo geugeos(haneul)eul jieusyeossnola
geubunkkeseoneun geugeos(haneul)ui kkogdaegileul ollisyeossgo geu hu geugeos-eul gyundeunghage dusyeoss-eumyeo
geugeos-ui bam-eul eodubge hasyeossgo geugeos-ui achimbich-eul naesyeossnola
geunal ingan-eun jasin-ui nolyeog-eul tteoollil geos-ila
boneun ja-ege jiog-ui moseub-i deuleonal ttae
sillo taoleuneun buljiog, geugos-i geojujiga doel geos-ila
geuleona jasin-ui junim ap-e seoneun il-eul dulyeowohamyeo jasin-ui yogguleul jeoljehadeon janeun
sillo cheongug, geugos-i geojujiga doel geos-ila
geudeul-i geudae(muhammadeu)ege jongmal-ui sigan-e gwanhae mul-euni “geugeos-eun eonje gaesidoendan mal-inga?”
geugeos(gaesi sigan)ui eongeub-e gwanhayeo geudaega eotteon gwanlyeon-i issdan mal-inga
geugeos-ui jisig-eun geudae junimkkeman issneun geos-ila
geudaeneun ojig geugeos(jongmal-ui sigan)eul dulyeowohaneun jaleul wihan gyeong-gojail ppun-ila
geugeos(jongmal-ui sigan)eul boneun nal geudeul-eun machi (hyeonseeseo) ohuna achimnajeolman-eul meomulleossda saeng-gaghal geos-ila
